import "./Listing.css"; import { useState } from "react"; function Listing(props) { const [showFullListing, setShowFullListing] = useState(false); return (
  • setShowFullListing(!showFullListing)} >

    {props.name}

    {showFullListing ? props.address + ", " + props.city + ", " + props.state + " " + props.zip : props.address} {props.status ? "ACTIVE" : "INACTIVE"}

    {props.desc}

    • ); } export default Listing;
